servinfo.title: Cool air comes out only at high speed

condition.ptxt: Cool air comes out only at high speed

action.ptxt: Check condenser referring to A/C Condenser Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check the amount of refrigerant and system for leaks.
Replace desiccant, and then perform evacuation and charge referring to Operation Procedure for Charging A/C with Refrigerant:J24B and N32A Model .

ps.ptxt: Accessory (A/C compressor) drive belt loosened or broken

action.ptxt: Replace drive belt and/or belt tensioner as necessary.
